cuisine.description: Bengaluru's cuisine is a blend of traditional South Indian flavors with modern influences.  Expect a variety of dosas, idlis, vadas, and other rice-based dishes.  The city also boasts excellent biryani, kebabs, and North Indian fare. Udupi cuisine, known for its vegetarian dishes, is also prominent. Don't miss trying local specialties like Bisi Bele Bath, Masala Dosa, and Obbattu.

hidden_gems.description: Beyond the well-trodden tourist paths, Bengaluru offers unique experiences.
places: Ranganathittu Bird Sanctuary (slightly outside Bengaluru but worth the trip)

cultural_events.description: Bengaluru has a vibrant cultural scene with numerous events throughout the year. Check local listings for the most up-to-date information.

famous_around_tata_silk_farm: Silk products (especially from Tata Silk Farm itself)
